entry.title: New DjangoCon Europe 2020 schedule released (0.10)

A new DjangoCon Europe 2020 schedule has been released!

Nothing has changed, we just wanted to change the version name. It was going out of style.

entry.title: New DjangoCon Europe 2020 schedule released (0.5)
entry.summary:
A new DjangoCon Europe 2020 schedule has been released!

We had to move some talks, so if you were planning on seeing them, check their new dates or locations:

  • ‚ÄúHow To Break Django: With Async‚Äù by Andrew Godwin (Sept. 19, 2020, 4:55 p.m. ‚Üí Sept. 19, 2020, 5:10 p.m.)
  • ‚ÄúCreating a spotify-like personal streaming service with Django and Vue: Lessons learned‚Äù by Emma Delescolle (Sept. 18, 2020, 2:55 p.m. ‚Üí Sept. 18, 2020, 3:10 p.m.)
  • ‚ÄúChoose, and choose quickly: Optimising ModelChoiceField‚Äù by Carlton Gibson (Sept. 19, 2020, 3:35 p.m. ‚Üí Sept. 19, 2020, 3:50 p.m.)
  • ‚ÄúHow to Hack a Django Website‚Äù by Adam Johnson (Sept. 18, 2020, 4:55 p.m. ‚Üí Sept. 18, 2020, 5:10 p.m.)
  • ‚ÄúThe Design and Development of Choices in Django 3.0‚Äù by Shai Berger (Sept. 19, 2020, 4:15 p.m. ‚Üí Sept. 19, 2020, 4:30 p.m.)
  • ‚ÄúA Pentester's Thoughts on Django Security‚Äù by Pascal Uter (Sept. 18, 2020, 3:35 p.m. ‚Üí Sept. 18, 2020, 3:50 p.m.)
  • ‚ÄúCan't Get You Out of My Head‚Äù by Aaron Bassett (Sept. 18, 2020, 4:15 p.m. ‚Üí Sept. 18, 2020, 4:30 p.m.)

entry.title: New DjangoCon Europe 2020 schedule released (0.2)

We have new talks!

entry.title: New DjangoCon Europe 2020 schedule released (0.1)
entry.summary:
The first DjangoCon Europe 2020 schedule has been released!

This is where it all began.
